Screen is inconsistent, sometimes it's extremely sensitive, and sometimes it just won't register, even with the included pointer.

Reviews.Title: Work fine but having some problems.
Reviews.Author: travis
Reviews.Content: Well it has been working fine,but charging it becomes the problem where the cord plugs in it,you have to hold it or prop it up so it will take a full charge.

Reviews.Title: Will NEVER buy another Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Butterflykisses1781
Reviews.Content: This is our 3rd Zeepad and each of them has had a unique issue.  The manufacturer doesn't even have a phone number you can contact for support and there is no one that will service these devices.  This on in particular stopped charging with the provided charging cord 2 days after we got it.  Thank God I purchased a Square Trade Warranty on it so I could get credit to buy a Kindle for my daughter instead.

Reviews.Title: Loved this tablet until it would not charge
Reviews.Author: Erika
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son's 7th birthday and he loved it. Now it's three months later it will not charge nor come on.

Reviews.Title: Three and a half
Reviews.Author: valerie mclean
Reviews.Content: It did not have skype on it nor did it have any pre loaded games but over all not to bad. I give it 3.5 stars

Reviews.Title: Great android
Reviews.Author: Eva Simon
Reviews.Content: This tablet really surprised me, its great i don't feel the need to bring my laptop everywhere with me because it practically does all what the laptop can do. However the one problem with the zeepad is that it can't handle too much pressure otherwise it just freezes and then you would have to restart it and the camera well mine worked for like about a month and then it just stopped working really don't know why to this day. But still i would recommend it for adults, kids, grandparents it fun and easy to use too

Reviews.Title: Great Product for a Great Price!!!!
Reviews.Author: Erin Storey`
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sons birthday present, we wanted a tablet for him that wasn't crazy expensive but he could play games and read books, and even go onto facebook.  It is the perfect size and works great!!  The only problem I had was once trying to connect to the internet. I fixed the time zone and it connected right away. It is set up just like my Galaxay Tablet so the set up for us was real easy. Great product for a Great price!!

Reviews.Title: It's alright, few serious things though.
Reviews.Author: Michael Riddle
Reviews.Content: My tablet came with Jelly Bean 4.1.1 NOT ICS 4.0.4, and was NOT rooted. Luckily there's a program called Uberizer that can root 4.1.1 for any A13 device. The downside right now is there is a 4.2.2 update, but it's not rooting right...Overall, if you're just looking for a simple tablet for a kid to play with or something it's not to bad -- I plan to use it for my car's touchscreen/computer and am going to have to do a lot of tinkering to get it working how I was hoping.

Reviews.Title: Not the best tablet
Reviews.Author: GrammaBarbara
Reviews.Content: I am a bit disappointed with this tablet.  It is slow coming on.  The manual gives very little info and in poor English.  It is not as easy to use as I hoped it would be.  I should have read the reviews on this before investing in it.

Reviews.Title: Tablet Review
Reviews.Author: Dogrgreat
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a low cost tablet for a Friend in the Philippines and this Fit the BillIt has a good price and the product works fineI needed assistance setting up the Wifi for this Tablet, so I did a search on the Internet and there is a lot of information  for this tablet, I followed the instructions and the WiFi is workingIt has been in use,for several months and so far, so goodI feel that this tablet is very good for the price

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: Jacki Deckard
Reviews.Content: The screen doesn't work well. I have only had it a short time and used it maybe 10 times due to the fact that the screen doesn't work well at all. Sometimes it doesn't work at all. Wish I had pd more and gotten a better product.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Service
Reviews.Author: M. Rue
Reviews.Content: This is my second purchase of the same item from this company. The first time I purchased this item and few months later the back camera was not working. I contacted to company who was more than happy to assist me with an exchange. The delivery time was shorter than expected and the prices for the product you just cant beat. This ultimately resulted in my return business now purchasing another Zeepad with this company. Keep up the great customer service!!

Reviews.Title: Worth the price
Reviews.Author: Debbie Mclean-roache
Reviews.Content: This works fine for a five year old. Did not expect it to perform like a galaxy tab or something more expensive. Its worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Not so good
Reviews.Author: leorock
Reviews.Content: Cheap tablet, not durable, LCD screen got a black line across the screen after a few months of use. Recommended only for little children.

Reviews.Title: 2 out of 3 still working!
Reviews.Author: Justsilvie
Reviews.Content: Bought 3 for Christmas gift for my grandchildren. Two out of three still work, the third stopped working after 6 months. If I had bought it locally I would have tried to take it back with my receipt since my son could not find the original packing and warranty info.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Tomoe Murai
Reviews.Content: My first tablet. I just wanted to read free PDF or EPub books in the train and occasionally write/read email.For the purpose, this is great. It may be slow for internet browsing, Android is not the latest and the battery doesn't run too long, but good enough for my use. Transferring files from/to PC is really simple. The price is hard to beat.Only the con is the color (red). For some reason other colors were $10 more expensive, then, red is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: it was defected
Reviews.Author: Norma Mendivil
Reviews.Content: It was defected when i got it so i reterned it and got my money back so thats good .

Reviews.Title: Still trying to get it to work
Reviews.Author: Barry C. Adams
Reviews.Content: This darn tablet is driving me crazy....The main problem is that it tries to type everything it hears......I mean everything.  Of course it is not typing English.  Best I can figure it is attempting to write Chinese.  You just constantly get a bunch of symbols.  It is impossible to use it much less teach someone how to use it because of that constant interruption from it typing on its own.  My computer tech has it now.........he may be able to get rid of the voice command problem but it is going to cost me........I figured out how to turn it off......but it keeps turning itself back on...........tried putting a piece of tape over the microphone............didn't help.  As far as directions / operating instructions..................horrible.................definitely a poor Chinese translation with conflicting instructions and false info.JUST WANTED THIS FOR MY MOTHER TO PLAY WORDS WITH FRIENDS WITH ME AS HER IPHONE IS TOO TINY FOR HER TO SEE....................THIS WoPad IS ........SoBad...........she can not even use it.............shoulda got her the Kindle HD.  at least Amazon has some support and can help get it running..............but hey, its a pretty pink.........paperweight.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the cost!
Reviews.Author: hartbach
Reviews.Content: I cannot claim total perfection for this product, but it is perfect for the cost. I have not found the flaws I read about while researching this. It seems well constructed, feels just right in the hands. Granted I have only owned it an hour (o:  If defects show up I will update.Pros:CostSizeEase of useAll attachments fit snugCons:Yes, it is slower than other tablets. Not so bad to make it a no goWill not Flash Play unkess you down load Firefox......that is easy though.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work well!
Reviews.Author: Theresa M. Horodowicz
Reviews.Content: This product takes forever to load. I know it's not an ipad. I had a Pandigital for about a year and it was faster than this one! It's does have some popular games and Netflix. You can only charge it for an hour, it works for about two hours on the battery and you can not use the adapter to  run it only battery powered.

Reviews.Title: its okay considering.
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Bizzell
Reviews.Content: i bought this for my 3 year old. its okay for her but i get frustrated with how slow it moves.

Reviews.Title: charger ports
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: well I have had enough time to say if I like this thing or not.  Not!  only 1 hour of play on full charge.  stalls frequently.  one charger port is broken and now having issues with barrel pport!  so now what?

Reviews.Title: Great product - Great price!
Reviews.Author: Tbaz
Reviews.Content: Works just as good as the higher priced tablets!!  You can download any app from the Play Store and use Skype!

Reviews.Title: It doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Jennifer "Ramalajen"
Reviews.Content: The tablet does not work. If isn not plugged does not turn on. If is connecting to a PC does not load the menu. They have not been able to repair. I honestly do not recommend it, is the worst product I bought on Amazon

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Wanda Kay Hight
Reviews.Content: Came fast and my daughter loves it.  She sat on it and broke it- but it worked great until she did that!  Thank you for a couple of months of great usage.

Reviews.Title: cute and cool
Reviews.Author: *MsKool*_*2012*
Reviews.Content: Its a great cheap tablet/phone. It operates pretty much like a big cell phone. A little slow but you get what you pay for. Reccomend for a childs 1st tablet!

Reviews.Title: good at first
Reviews.Author: dana
Reviews.Content: It was working amazing at first now it is very slow and often closes down my apps and occasionally completely shuts itself off.

Reviews.Title: whew finally my samsung chromebook and Sasmsung galaxy tablet are free from the messy hands
Reviews.Author: Incognito
Reviews.Content: Bought this for the kids. Took sometime to get used to it and figure it out ,but once the kids knew that it does all that the Galaxy do and its theirs ...they are in love. Very handy when they travelled. Small little piece but with price you cant go wrong .Airplane mode was a bit dodgy

Reviews.Title: gift for a college student
Reviews.Author: Juan Marquez
Reviews.Content: this was a gift for our niece that is going to college. she absolutely loves it. she purchased an additional case with built in keyboard and has become a very practical tool for her.

Reviews.Title: Good for kids
Reviews.Author: mawmaw
Reviews.Content: Its alright A little slow My granddaughter uses it. Not for any major use. Why do I have to have a limit on my words.

Reviews.Title: perfect for my twins
Reviews.Author: Debra Williams
Reviews.Content: it does everything it needs to for my 7 yr old twins. Very easy to operate and very durable. They love it.. Would only recommend for children

Reviews.Title: My zeepad
Reviews.Author: debbie
Reviews.Content: I love it. It is everything I expected and more.The price was great and it is so pretty. Wifi is great too

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: The zeepad isn't bad for a 3yr old but the only problem for us is that is too FRAGILE and it takes a bit of TIME for it to think some times it froze when we was downloading apps. HONESTLY if ur child isn't delicate with things I don't recommend it my daughters broke in 1week nd it has no guarantee on it!!

Reviews.Title: upset with the product quality
Reviews.Author: sarah mogu
Reviews.Content: all of them broke within 1 month of buying the product. The charger broke it was a waste of money. I tried to contact them they will not refund back the money or take back their product because it is worthless keeping.

Reviews.Title: what you shuld know!!
Reviews.Author: Christina Bosworth
Reviews.Content: I have had problems with this tablet since I received it.It constantly freezes, I had to send i back to replace it because the screen went out 3 weeks after receiving it. and now the touch sincere is not working am returning and buying from another company.

Reviews.Title: its a great item...
Reviews.Author: Julia Warner
Reviews.Content: I had purchased it to use in my business for my card reader.. but the operating system isn't capable, over all a good purchase

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0
Reviews.Author: Doug Jones
Reviews.Content: We sent it back. Display was very poor. not very responsive when using it. We ended up buying a more expensive unit and are very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Its very nice and lite!
Reviews.Author: blackqueen
Reviews.Content: Am still exploring my tablet when my daughter gives me the chance to use it. But I like it very much am thinking about getting one for her so I could have mine to myself!

Reviews.Title: Very pleased!
Reviews.Author: twirl6785
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my niece almost two months ago. She loves it! Durable, fast, and great for children. Great product, awesome price, and fast shipping. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Jollie Williams
Reviews.Content: Great for kids! Would recommend first before spending big dollars on IPad products.Picture quality not the best but loads apps in a snap.

Reviews.Title: Very Disappointed kids at Christmas :(
Reviews.Author: Mom
Reviews.Content: Do not buy from "engine29". This product had big problems right away which would have been frustrating, but ok if the seller had any concept of customer service. They ignored multiple emails, and when they did email back gave short answers that didn't solve anything. Don't waste your money. Now I'm stuck with a broken Zeepad and a disappointed 5 and 8 year old.

Reviews.Title: Great deal on purchase
Reviews.Author: simona brooks
Reviews.Content: i have receive tablet and the descripation fits my purchase as i am ready to order more of the same.Enjoying

Reviews.Title: SAVE YOUR MONEY DONT BUY
Reviews.Author: California
Reviews.Content: Bought this tablet a while ago and its a piece of junk. the processor is too slow to run games and freezes constantly. both cameras are suckish and the plastic housing feels like they bought the material at dollar tree. so buyers beware, if u want a better faster device, save up money for an ipad mini or nexus 7

Reviews.Title: BROKEN SHIPING ..
Reviews.Author: Zariyah N.
Reviews.Content: IT BROKE AS SOON AS I GOT IT I WAS SO UP SET WHEN U TRYED TO SHIP IT BACK I COULDNT REACH U GUYS TO TELL U THAT I WAS ON VACATION  .................

Reviews.Title: Save your money
Reviews.Author: Scarlet
Reviews.Content: I purchased this in January and have had problems with it since I got it. First off I couldn't get the app store to work, so added Amazons app store and got good results. Then when adding an anti-virus program to the tablet I found out that it had been used before I received it, and could not clear out that persons info. So it wasn't safe to use on sites where I wanted to purchase anything for fear someone could get my info. And because I found all this out after the 30 warranty period I was stuck with it. And now to top it off, I am unable to charge the tablet with either the plug or the cord. This product is just a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Do not purchase
Reviews.Author: Denise Clance
Reviews.Content: We purchased 4 tablets for Christmas for our grandchildren. Have been disappointed with this product of zeepad. They have had problems with pads every since we purchased them....

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: jamie gilliam
Reviews.Content: This zeepad is a very good tablet for such a low price.  My daughter is very happy with it, she uses it all the time.

Reviews.Title: this was terrible
Reviews.Author: Raphy
Reviews.Content: the screen is crappy it broke the second day i got it and its really slow an they wont let me return it so dont get it its a waste of money

Reviews.Title: my screen was all scratched up
Reviews.Author: vanity
Reviews.Content: my screen was all scratched up it doesn't want to stay connected to wifi I have to keep making it connect

Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: taysmom
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter as a cheaper alternative to an iPad or galaxy but I should have just bit the bullet and spent a few more dollars. I had to return it with in 2 months because it wouldn't charge. It took weeks to get it back and 4 months later we had the same problem. It is JUNK! plain and simple. Engine29 is not a great seller to purchase from either. They are very hard to get ahold of.

Reviews.Title: 7" Zeepad Tablet
Reviews.Author: Charlotte Branigan-Taylor
Reviews.Content: I was very satisfied with the tablet and the time that it took for me to receive it. I purchased it for my granddaughter for her birthday and I had plenty of time to download games on it for her.

Reviews.Title: Worthless
Reviews.Author: Martha McGough
Reviews.Content: I had it less than three months when the case melted while it charged.  I would not recommend it to anyone as the quality is sub par.

Reviews.Title: GREAT DEAL FOR KIDS!
Reviews.Author: Taismine Beasley "ocd mom"
Reviews.Content: I HAVE A TEN YEAR OLD WHO LOVES THIS> IT IS PERFECT FOR SOMEONE WHO DOES NOT NEED ALL THE BIGGEST BRANDS WITH THEIR BIG BRAND PRICE> T>B> CORAL SPRINGS< FLORIDA

Reviews.Title: Power Cord Required...
Reviews.Author: M. Gibson
Reviews.Content: Battery life if really poor.  You only get an hour and a half, then you need to plug in a recharge.  Very disappointing!

Reviews.Title: Great for the kids
Reviews.Author: jvi
Reviews.Content: This product is great for my kids.  It does not play all games but plays most that a 5 year old would want to play.  Everything said it is a great buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: It Crashed
Reviews.Author: Jailyn Cabrera
Reviews.Content: It crashed do to an app, it wasn't backed-up like it said. I lost EVERYTHING! But otherwise.....its pretty good. I dont like how the wifi diconnects itself though

Reviews.Title: Zeepad Tablet
Reviews.Author: sherelyn johnson
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband who has never used a computer of any kind.  He is in love with his tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: hg088
Reviews.Content: I think that for the price this is absolutely a bargain. You can't compare this with other pricier tabs but i works really well and you can  do most tasks these tabs do

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS JUNK!!! (Most helpful comment!)
Reviews.Author: J. Morgan
Reviews.Content: Within the first WEEK this thing stopped working. It gets stuck at the Android screen and refuses to boot. I checked everywhere online for a solution and there isn't one. Not to mention, this is a VERY common issue with this product! Search yourself!I went on Youtube where the guy was doing a Zeepad review, and I advised others to not buy this thing. And guess what? A few days afterward someone replied to me and told me it just happened to them.Thank god this was backed by Amazons return policy and happened within 30 days.I don't have any frets against the seller, everything was received and delivered quickly. The actual product is my only issue.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7" Allwinner Tablet
Reviews.Author: linda
Reviews.Content: 1)  Tried to find some directions for setup and options - found very little.  Would still be nice to get info on this Tablet.2)  Pressing Keys to bring up different app or screen - Very slow or not at all to switch screens - Very disappointed.3)  Would like to return it and use my $30.00 credit on something else.

Reviews.Title: Item received is not the item listed or pictured.
Reviews.Author: ASHTEK
Reviews.Content: It is not a zeepad. ordered this for my daughters birthday, what I got is a knock off of a zeepad. It was just too late to return it, at least it looked good when she got to open it.

Reviews.Title: Damaged Charging Port
Reviews.Author: willy sanchez
Reviews.Content: The team is not charging, apparently the current power makes bad wine or port of the tablet is damaged, I will buy another power cable to check if it is the port that is damaged

Reviews.Title: very disappointed
Reviews.Author: Denise B
Reviews.Content: The touch screen is often very delayed. The wifi is weak . The browser often closes. I guess  you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Tim "Timdiana" Dunn
Reviews.Content: I really like this android. I'm surprised at how well the operation work , such as streaming Netflix, being able to talk on Skype; and connecting to the AccuRave ELM327 Bluetooth OBD2 Diagnostic Code Scanner - Scan Tool Check Engine Light CAR Code Reader - Android Compatible. It may not look it, but this android is fantastic. I highly recommend getting it.

Reviews.Title: cheap
Reviews.Author: robin cedrone
Reviews.Content: this Zeepad, is not what i thought it was. it was cheaply made. not only that it cost me 30 dollars to return it to China, and they kept saying they never got it back. they still have not got it back so Amazon was kind enough to not only reimburse me for the shipping and handling, but they also gave me my money back. I would look for where they are shipping your item from because if i knew it was china, i would not have ordered it. they promised to reimburse me for shipping and handling, then reneged on their promise.

Reviews.Title: It broke in 2 weeks
Reviews.Author: Dionne N.
Reviews.Content: I should have took the advise form the others and not bought it! It worked for only a weekand stopped working. I'm in the process of trying to return it.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Sultan Khan
Reviews.Content: Its kind of cool Android tablet for kids but lacks little bit of speed. I would say you get what you pay for ...I am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: AllLOSER -- the screen was lifted from the bezel had to return it.
Reviews.Author: Christian Glahn
Reviews.Content: So far I've not been able to use an Allwinner tablet enough to like or hate it.  I'll wait to see if I EVER get the second unit that I returned and was supposed to come back to me.

Reviews.Title: Fast shipping and great project
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I ordered my Zeepad on a Friday and received it on Tuesday. The product was exactly what it said it would be. It was a great buy.

Reviews.Title: everything I wanted
Reviews.Author: FeFe
Reviews.Content: 7" Zeepad 7.0 Allwinnwer A13 Boxchip Cortex A8 Android 4.0, 4GB Capacity, 512 MB RAM, Multiple Touch Capactive screen, WIFI, Camera, Skype Video Calling, Netflix Movies. I love everything about this tablet, it has everything I need and in my favorite color. Perfect size for me.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Valerie Kleespies "dog lover"
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Zeepad from another company and it was not good quality. So I purchased one from goodios and it works perfectly I am so glad I purchased a different one. Easy to use and my niece loves that it had some games already on it.

Reviews.Title: Rating
Reviews.Author: Liselle StLouis
Reviews.Content: It is very slow and it is not useful. It constantly freezes up and the batteries dies very fast. Don't buy this item because its a sell off

Reviews.Title: Almost Perfect.
Reviews.Author: Thomas B.
Reviews.Content: Apps loaded well great speed small in size, the only problem i had was that the built in speaker didnt work, I still want the product, just one that works completly.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my Little Man , 6 yrs old, and he loves it. Can do everything on it that he loves. Has game apps and netflix. Works great.The only drawback is the battery life. It last about 2 hours. But with a USB charger for the car it is great to take on the road.I am wanting to get one for myself. This is a great tablet and the price makes it even better!

Reviews.Title: No problems
Reviews.Author: Paula
Reviews.Content: I have been so proud of my pad. It has really been my company since my surgery. Better than if I had an ipad. Way less expensive with so many features!

Reviews.Title: Good tablet
Reviews.Author: robert
Reviews.Content: I had to buy a new one becuse my old one fell down the basement stairs the screen didn't crack nothing broke but the power button what I find odd is when I got my new one it came with the USB cord and a good charger but my old one just came with a USB cord that plugs in to a wall charger I only baought the one that broke three months ago before buying a new one with the old one I chould only charge it with a USB cord that connects to a wall charger and the USB port was starting to become worn out so they must have changed it were they send you a good charger and the USB cord separately with the pad I love the new one and its small enough to put in my cargo pants side pocket iam thinking about buying one for my brother seeing how its durable to a limit it whould be great for a kids first tablet I think I'll be more carefull with the new one lol

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: San-Alva "Always go with the best- investigat...
Reviews.Content: Tablet works great. Not really a lot to say. Apps run seamlessly and little to no hiccups. Google Play compatibility is a plus.

Reviews.Title: Ok for kids
Reviews.Author: Ochoa
Reviews.Content: This tablet is good a little slow but for the kids it's perfect. Can't expect better for that price,even though I bought 3 and had to return 2 already 1 because it was used and the other because it stop working 20 days after receiving it.

Reviews.Title: amazing tablet!!!
Reviews.Author: Brittany
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet as a gift, and I was so excited! This is a great tablet and really fun to use! The only thing I didn't like about it was two things.1. the battery runs out to fast2. two apps of mine don't work no matter whatOther than these reasons I like this tablet a lot and I think that anyone would like it too!

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY. You WILL regret it.
Reviews.Author: jessica
Reviews.Content: Had the item for a little over 5 months and now it does not work.  I saw the negative reviews but like an idiot, I figured it wouldnt happen to me.  NONE of my apps work (even then the ones i paid for).  The color is crap.  Dont sit in the light while using it because all you will get is a glare on the screen.  I got this for my son who loves temple run, even he didnt want to play it.  You get what you pay for.  Never again.  A very poor investment.

Reviews.Title: Not as advertised
Reviews.Author: Patricia Sarju
Reviews.Content: I ordered this as a gift for someone. The specs indicated that this had a front and back camera...even the pictures show this. Delivery time was good....but product has only ONE Camera (on the screen section ) and not back and front as advertised. As to how it works....can't say as yet. I will have to wait for a feed back re that.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Rosetta Anderson "Rosetta Anderson"
Reviews.Content: I bought the zeepad for my grand-daughter who is 6 years old.  She loves it.  It locked up one time and I couldn't get it to turn off or anything.  My husband finally held down the power button until it turned off.  Overall, its a great product.  The downside is it takes a long time to charge up, but she usually does it overnight anyway.  You can download lots of games on it.  She has downloaded temple run I & II.  I am happy with this purchase.  My brother had bought her the meep pad and it didn't last 4 months.

Reviews.Title: love this tablet
Reviews.Author: Forquetta Cooper
Reviews.Content: We got it for my son he loves his tablet he never put it down yet . And for my comment before disregard it. My son love playing the free games from the Android market and it's very kid friendly. Very happy mom.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Kimica Reynolds
Reviews.Content: This product does exactly what it says. I bought it for my mom who isnt tech savy. She really enjoys it. This product is great for a person who is just getting started. Dont expect it to be like the i pad. Its also a great start for a child. Its great price wise also. Overrall its great.

Reviews.Title: I Like it
Reviews.Author: Marishka More
Reviews.Content: I like it but sometimes stops when using it. For the rest it works all right. I am satisfied with my purchase. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Jetonz
Reviews.Content: To Lagy freezes to much waste of money the display is horrible also the gets scratch so easy.........................................fgjoffidiztyssdyufcxxxggfccghj bugged chick. Cugfigffyictghcgjufguxhxghvjhcyvn b vcv

Reviews.Title: No thank you.
Reviews.Author: Meagan Fitzgerald
Reviews.Content: I read all the reviews before buying this tablet.  I expected to get what I paid for.  What I got was less then 1 month of usage before it just wouldn't work at all.  It was a gift for my son and since I ordered it ahead of time, the return date was his actual birthday.  I was hesitant to buy electronics on amazon and now I have learned my lesson.  :(

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: JoAnna I Nishimura
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 9yr old son because he was constantly using my phone to go on the internet. The product has held up to the constant usage and great for netflix and games for a child his age. Only down fall is the speed, but Im not to worried about that because other than that it works great for media and social purposes. The price is great for the product

Reviews.Title: Not happy
Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: Not at all happy with the product.  I tried to call customer service and all I got was an answering machine.  It has been on charge for 2 hours and still does not work!!

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: Meg C.
Reviews.Content: I recently bought this for my daughters birthday (7) knowing nothing about tablets and was really pleasntly surprised. I didn't give it to her yet because her birthday is still a little ways away but I have been playing with it, setting up the apps she likes moving the things she will play the most to the home screen, things like that, and its very easy to use and manuver. The size is going to be perfect for her and the price you cant beat. Its not an ipad so dont expct perfection, but if u have a tech savy kid and are tired of the old " its my turn on moms phone!" between siblings then this is for you! My only complaint is I have yet to figure out the parentel controls but close monitoring should be a close second to blocking. And I also wanna give it up to Goodios for prompt delivery and a courtesy email asking how I liked my product so far. I feel if you wanna buy this tablet, this would be the company to buy from.

Reviews.Title: I did not receive ** Bonus: Earphones, Stylus,Screen Protector
Reviews.Author: Will
Reviews.Content: I just got the tab in teh mail yesterday and have yet to figure out how good it is, but I am disappointed that i did not receive the ** Bonus: Earphones, Stylus,Screen Protector that was promised.Will update ASAP

Reviews.Title: Inferior Screen quality but the price isn't that high
Reviews.Author: Himanshu Anand
Reviews.Content: i got a device with a faulty screen and I returned it but irrespective of that the device was inferior in quality in its screen and speed as well. I tried installing the groupon app on it multiple times but it just won't work. The touch sensitivity wasn't great too. It is a cheap device but I decided to pay more and get kindle fire HD after working with this for couple of hours.

Reviews.Title: 57donn
Reviews.Author: Donn "Donn"
Reviews.Content: This item was just right for the person it was ordered for, I ordered it for my 13 yr. old granddaughter and she loved it.

Reviews.Title: Meets Expectations
Reviews.Author: Mirna
Reviews.Content: Its good for downloading apps, but the reason i give it 4 stars is because sometimes it just freezes. Its an okay product

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Lana Lee
Reviews.Content: Is does all the things it said it could do.  It had enough 4 GB capacity to do just about anything.  Love the portability of the Zeepad, screen size, Skype capabilities and Netflix movies.  Would be a great gift for a teen in high school or for anything that you can imagines.

Reviews.Title: Only lasted less than a month
Reviews.Author: ldb3
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday gift for my 7 year old daughter. It was a good tablet for a 7 year old. Able to download apps, upload her favorite music, watch her cartoons. Till one day the screen just popped off and once I snapped it back on it just wouldn't turn back on. Returned it back to Amazon, no exchange just refund. Ordered another one and again the screen popped off and snapped it back on and would't turn back on. Returning the second one today. Will pay a little extra and get a Kindle Fire. When it works I would give it Four and half stars, but poorly made product.

Reviews.Title: Good for price
Reviews.Author: S. Edmundson
Reviews.Content: It is a great size, made well. But the android system locks up quite a bit. The touchscreen freezes at times. But I suppose for the cost, it's good.

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: ryan alton
Reviews.Content: i bought the zeepad for my daughter for her 6th birthday and she loves it! the touch screen is great however there is a delay sometimes but nothing that seems like a big deal. The company that shipped it was right on time. All in all its a terrific gift.

Reviews.Title: slow  to touchy w/ stylist too  short battery life  when strowing it enlarges way to easy  maybe 10yrs will like it
Reviews.Author: nadeen j puczylowski
Reviews.Content: it's a nice pink.  the stylist needs a home  it was for fun but to much time to get anywhere

Reviews.Title: Can't complain for the price
Reviews.Author: S. Atwood
Reviews.Content: It's a cheap tablet so for the price it is good.The things I didn't like was that the volume is very weak, and it is very slow with loading. also sometimes i thought the screen wasn't sensitive enough and i had to push harder...which often messed up my typing. Also I often could not load movies.Otherwise I think it's a pretty ok tablet

Reviews.Title: really like this
Reviews.Author: Tiffany M.
Reviews.Content: I really Like the Zeepad. It works really well for me so far. oniy gripe I have is the battery life wish it stayed on longer through out the day. also brought a case with a keyboard so I use it to type reports and take notes in class. Good product overall.

Reviews.Title: fraud
Reviews.Author: wade
Reviews.Content: This item arrived on time and has everything as listed except the post stated it was 7" it very far from that size was very disappointed in that cause i was expecting 7 inches tablet!!!

Reviews.Title: Where Do I Start
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: When my pavkage arrive the screen wasn't all the way close. The 2 charges that was sent would not charge my son tablet. I tried contacting the seller twice no responds. The tablet would not come on had to open the tablet to find out everything was taped down and the tape on the video card was loose.  The reason why my son's tablet wouldn't come on. If I could do it over I would just go to HHGreg or somewhere and get what I paid for

Reviews.Title: THE TABLET HAVE A LOCK CODE DAT WANT RESET I TRIED EVERYTHIN
Reviews.Author: tracy
Reviews.Content: I FEEL LYKE DIS IS A RIPOFF I BOUGHT DIS FOR A GIFT AND HAVNT USED IT BT ONCE ITS NT WORTH MY MONEY

Reviews.Title: Two out of Three broke in less than Three Months and NO support
Reviews.Author: Russell E. Holland Jr
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these for my kids for Christmas - seemed like a cheap alternative to see if they would like this type of thing.They worked great at first, but within a week one charger burned out, then another so they were sharing the third charger or using the alternate usb charging.Then 2 of the 3 stopped taking a charge all together.  Terrible construction on this product.And the service was worse - they first offered to sell me 2 new chargers at the same price I could just order them from amazon and then offered to fix the pads IF I paid for the fix because it was past 30 days - shortest warrantee I ever heard of...Do yourself a favor and splurge for the ASUS or Nexus right out of the gate.

Reviews.Title: Awful
Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: I wanted something for my grand daughter that she would enjoy it is being return it only stays on for a maxium of 45 min even fully charged..

Reviews.Title: Volume sucked!
Reviews.Author: gaox
Reviews.Content: 5 DAY UPDATE! : I've been trying to return this piece of crap since the second day I received it because the volume is not cooperating with me, but no response from the seller. >:( Getting REALLY frustrated, and I have it just sitting in its box now! I just filed another return request, and if nothing happens again and it surpasses the 14 day policy, I'm FILING A CLAIM!Just received my pink Zeepad today. Really disappointed because the volume SUCKS! I have it at its highest and can barely hear. It sounds terrific with headphones on, but I don't wanna use headphones every time I watch Netflix or listen to music. Other than the volume issue, everything seems to be working fine. Camera quality is pretty bad, but I've seen worse.

Reviews.Title: Dont spend your money
Reviews.Author: Daniel D. Saiz
Reviews.Content: It did get here very quick, I bought it for a class I was taking. It worked very well for what I needed it for, looking up homework on dropbox. I bought it in January, now in May it stopped working, the on-off button broke and fell into the tablet. Now i'm having to send it back, and pay for the repair myself. It was great for a while, but I really should have spent the $30 more and bought another one.

Reviews.Title: Do not purchase, doesn't work straight out of box!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Andy'sMommy"
Reviews.Content: I wish I could give no stars!!  I charged as it says in the instructions and the item will not come on for more than a second!  Junk!  I am so mad because I bought accessories for this.  I can return this item, but how will I get those returned..hope they work on another 7inch tablet that will be better than this crap!  ugh!!  :(  I wish I had listened the negative reviews instead of all the stupid positive ones cause this things is pure crap!  It doesn't even have a smart charger that will shut off if you over charge and the instructions are weird and confusing and the stupid thing can't even be charged unless it is totally out of charge..too much to do for a kid to use this.  I guess I am glad it is broken now so I can return it rather than a month or so down the road when I wouldn't be able to!  :(

Reviews.Title: Good first tablet
Reviews.Author: Ryan Harris
Reviews.Content: Everything worked great on the tablet but the mic, i ordered two one from a different seller and this one. The pink one i ordered for my daughter's birthday worked great. The main reason of purchase was to skype with her. Given this ones mic did not work or at least it did not on skype, i sent it back. prior to, I checked all the settings and could not locate anything that would cause interference from the tablet and the program. The two tablets were suppose to be the same as well, but seemed the pink one had a different/newer desk top, even though they were both listed as the same product with the same system.

Reviews.Title: CHEAP JUNK - NOT A HAPPY CAMPER
Reviews.Author: Babsy 314
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet 4/9/13 and received it in early May.  It did not arrive in a timely manner in my opinion. The tablet that I received (I ordered two) loaded the wi-fi easily enough but the charger cord did not work after three charges and usb port did not work after the second plug in.  Yes, I opened it and saw that the port wasn't connected.  Then the tablet no longer accessed the wi-fi so I could not connect to the internet.  Because both tablets have been used and neither one works, I am stuck paying over $150.00 for items that do not work.  I have a few items that require a usb plug in and haven't had a problem at all with them. Maybe I got a lemon but either way, I will not order electronics from Amazon any more because the return policy is to restricted.

Reviews.Title: its not worth it at all
Reviews.Author: Yecenia
Reviews.Content: i just got my tablet on time and everything was fine but now its not working after 1 month of using it '-'

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for These zeepads are junk
Reviews.Author: Big Boy
Reviews.Content: I purchased 5 of these for my girls within a week 3 of them had technical problemsIf you can afford better go ahead and buy better

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Linda Samplawski "OzarkRoze"
Reviews.Content: I bought two for my daughter and myself.  Mine quit working the second day I used it.  Wasn't happy at all.

Reviews.Title: DO I NEED ONE?
Reviews.Author: Nyah W.
Reviews.Content: DO I need to buy an SD for the "Zeepad Tablet" or do I need to buy one by itself? The "Zeeped Table" is great I play on my cousins. LOVED IT!!!!

Reviews.Title: yes we love our red zeepad
Reviews.Author: tamara
Reviews.Content: Yes it  works great my kids play with it everyday and just love it. The apps that r already o it are great

Reviews.Title: Birthday Gift
Reviews.Author: melinda trosper
Reviews.Content: I bought this zeepad for my 7 year old granddaughters birthday. She LOVES it. I love that she LOVES it. It does everything she wants it to do.I am very pleased with this zeepad. No regrets, and certainly not any disappointments.

Reviews.Title: purchaced 3 not 1 works!
Reviews.Author: Jeana Simon
Reviews.Content: purchaced 3 of these for my children. 1 won't connect to the internet, 1 of the screens is broken (view) and the other takes about 5 minute just to get to one site.

Reviews.Title: Cheaply made
Reviews.Author: C. Carter
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 11 year old grand daughter and she LOVES it. I just didn't like how it distorts the screen when pressing on the back of it. It was cheaply made. Luckily, I purchased a case for it so that provides protection to the back and prevents my grand daughter from having issues with it. I give it a 4 star rating because it runs the OS extremely well and it runs the top apps also. Overall I think I made the right choice purchasing this for my grand daughter. She uses the Kindle and Netflix apps with not problems.

Reviews.Title: People claim reviews are fake which scared me, but I've given the time after receiving the product and have no complaints!
Reviews.Author: B. Mortinson
Reviews.Content: I ordered quickly after seeing high reviews. There was a delay with it being sent, and after closer overlook of reviews I found some pretty bad ones. I was fearful, so I took a couple weeks to be sure all was well. The product arrived within the time allotted. Weve had no problems with a power button, or battery problem, charging, nothing. It is a great product! Especially for the price!!!! Thanks!***UPDATE almost 6 mo later** A couple months ago the product stopped charging. Ive seen others on here also complaining of problems with the charging port but figured Id figure something out or it was cheap enough to just buy my daughter a higher quality tablet in the future. What I believe to be the problem it on the charger the metal piece is wobbly. Its loose and it makes sense because ive read of others piece getting stuck within the port. Ours hasnt. I hope to get some sort of response or help because were trying to find a charger for it and I have no idea what to do. I understand this product is low cost and it is a quality product for the price but if the chargers arent working and keep being loose we cant use the product. *****

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0
Reviews.Author: Wardell Willis
Reviews.Content: I love it and also my granddaughter.  It was a replacement for a Christmas gift which was dropped and destroyed.  She love it.  Will order another.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Randy Countryman
Reviews.Content: I love the color of it. It was a gift for my daughters birthday. She enjoys it. It's kind of slow, but does what she wants.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Mama Cayenne "Marie"
Reviews.Content: Great price, really gets a lot of use.  Easy to use no problems.  Will probably order another one for my 8 yr old.

Reviews.Title: BUYER BEWARE
Reviews.Author: Cati Holker
Reviews.Content: Wow, I wish I would have taken the bad reviews on this product more seriously.It took a LONG time for the product to come.  Shipment tracking was poor and non-specific.When I finally received the tablet, I was relieved (I was beginning to think I had been ripped off), and overall, I was happy with the tablet.Not ONE MONTH later, the power button became depressed/lodged and now my tablet is rendered useless. The tablet charges and the screen is active, but I cannot turn it on.  I contacted the company and have received no answer.This company is based in China, so correspondence can be difficult due to the language barrier.  This isn't a deal-breaker on it's own for me, in addition to everything else, it's just a tad bit frustrating.$80 wasted.

Reviews.Title: not bad
Reviews.Author: Arnold Keith Thurston "Keith"
Reviews.Content: This was a gift. The feedback has been positive.  It was compared to a large version of a phone.  Only complaint was a little slow at times.

Reviews.Title: no so bad
Reviews.Author: Gabriel
Reviews.Content: sometimes it freezes, and the scrren does not work, you press and press and stay like nohing happens, i purchased it for a little girl,,,,  so she is not going to use it that often... so, it is ok for her

Reviews.Title: worst tablet ever.
Reviews.Author: Jmerc
Reviews.Content: I don't get the persons who gave these tablets high reviews because they stink.  I understand for the money you get what you pay for but man these turned out bad.  First off the power supply broke all on it's own then the port became loose and you had to hold the cord on a angle for it charge. The screens scratched easily and one even cracked. They would freeze up and you had to reset it and the battery didn't last long at all. My cell phone worked better than this product. So save yourself the trouble and don't waste both your time and money! Your better off spending some money and getting  a good brand tablet. As always "you get what you pay for!"

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Dina J Green
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a xmas gift for my grandson and according to my daughter it is awesome! Its even better than the one she at a different story and different maker for my oldest granddaughter. Now my granddaughter wants the same exact one!

Reviews.Title: Make a different purchase
Reviews.Author: meshop2
Reviews.Content: This is a purchase I regret making.  It has many issues- including disconnecting from the internet, screen freezing up, slow to respond to a command.  Sometimes it won't turn on or off.  Also the front screen is plastic.  It came scratched and since then has bubbled up in places.  Very cheap.  I guess you get what you pay for.  I would not recommend this Zeepad to anyone.

Reviews.Title: hmmm
Reviews.Author: Nicole Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: i got this for my 6yr old and well i guess i didn't pay attention to where shipped from but got it way earlier than expected so that was nice but it was from China and some of the alerts pop up in Chinese and well i don't know how to change it since didn't come with instructions and i cant read Chinese lol so that doesn't help but she really likes it otherwise :)

Reviews.Title: Like my Tablet
Reviews.Author: Timothea Bow
Reviews.Content: I bought my tablet around the holidays and I liked so much that i purchase one for my daughter and my husband. and the both like their tablets. I was a great deal it meet my needs plus. I usemy tablet for e-mail and music and reading book.ths a geat puduct for traveling. I like my zeepad.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Timothea Bow
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my daugter and she loves she uses for downloading music and for the internet, facebook,e-mail. It just right for her and what she uses it for.  She loves her tablet.

Reviews.Title: I hate it
Reviews.Author: Hilda Rosado
Reviews.Content: My daughter hates it it does not do what we expected it to do she is really disappoint with this product so am I. I would never recommend it to any one.

Reviews.Title: will not work and its old
Reviews.Author: christopher foster
Reviews.Content: I will never buy anything from these people. the screen is scratch and it broke, thanks a lot. I wont my money back

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the price, the functionality is fine.
Reviews.Author: sshjaguar
Reviews.Content: This tablet is about as cheap in price as you can find... on that same note it is a bit slow and glitchy with multi-tasking, but hey it's less than $80 so you can't expect it to compare to a $300+ Galaxy or $400+ iPad. It works great for my needs!

Reviews.Title: Save your money, get the real thing
Reviews.Author: Richard Hull
Reviews.Content: Don't  buy this knock off! All this is, is a glorified android phone (minus the calling features).I bought myself a Kindle and my GF this, it's crap. After a week of using it and only 5 applications downloaded, it runs EXTREMELY slow. Not even just the internet, but loading the apps themselves is laggy and sluggish. The pink is cool, but the texture is very slippery and will fall often. Buy a case!Overall, if you can spend the extra $20-40, buy the real thing. This knock-off doesn't last long nor will it make anyone happy.

Reviews.Title: Good Tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Raffi
Reviews.Content: Works great form my 2 1/2 year old. little slow but for the price it is a ok product. Not as sturdy

Reviews.Title: nice product
Reviews.Author: destiny N.
Reviews.Content: i bought this product and gave it to a family member in another country, and they love it. It came in excellent timing and i still shocked as to how they got to me so quickly. Easy to use as well, thinking of getting 2 more for my kids.The price isnt bad but my boys are 4 and 6 and dont want to spend that much on it.

Reviews.Title: THIS IS EXACTLY WHAT I WANTED AND EXPECTED
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "BiloxiGal"
Reviews.Content: I got this for limited use while traveling back and forth to work on public transportation. I use it as an ebook reader more than anything.  It's exactly what I wanted.  I tried the least expensive Kindle, and found I just couldn't live with no color on the screen. I can download my ebooks from Amazon using the wi-fi at home with no problems.  The wi-fi setup didn't take any time at all.  The cost of the tablet is such that if I lose it or it disappears while taking it back and forth, I won't feel too bad.  I can also check my email once I get to work on a nearby open wi-fi network if I want to.  I installed a 16 gig sd card on it with some music files yesterday, but haven't tried it yet.  However, the transfer was a breeze.  My computer recognized the tablet, and the tablet showed the USB symbol that let me use it as another drive.I am very satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Deion
Reviews.Content: i got scrathed really easily but it was good and it also legged aloti couldnt play bike race and stuff like that

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS TABLET!
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: First of all it came straight from China and took almost a month to arrive. I bought it for my 14 year old daughter who is very tecno savvy more so than I. It worked for one day then half the screen stopped working and the image wouldn't rotate when you moved the tablet up and down. I shipped it back and it cost me 28 dollars to do so. Still haven't heard any confirmation on whether they have revived it yet and still no refund for the tablet or the shipping cost. Learn from my mistake and stay clear of this product and spend the little extra for a quality Android.

Reviews.Title: Great first tablet for your kids
Reviews.Author: A. Rodrick
Reviews.Content: It works like my Ipad , but the price was far less and I wont feel bad if the kids break it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent first tablet for my 6 year old
Reviews.Author: A. Rodrick
Reviews.Content: Pros: The price was great, the ease of use is great,Cons: Very hard to find replacement wall charger,car charger, I have one on order from engine69, hopfully its the correct one.

Reviews.Title: the zeepad works great but
Reviews.Author: Gregory sudds
Reviews.Content: i brought two and one of my 14 year old daughters power button has been push in now it won't work at all. what can we do about this ? i really like your products and would like to continue to buy but.  I need the peace of mind when something goes wrong we can resolve it in a timely you have my contact info

Reviews.Title: it was broke
Reviews.Author: Gregory sudds
Reviews.Content: This product was broke when shipped or received the screen did not work and was cracked i shipped it back to china and have not received any info yet ,and cant seem to find a number on them please resolve this problem

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I expected
Reviews.Author: jwjaram
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son's 7th birthday.  He loves it!  It does everything we need it to do, movies, music, books, games...and more!  Android devices are easy to work with!

Reviews.Title: Kid friendly tablet
Reviews.Author: NolaBigDawg
Reviews.Content: I purchased the tablet for a four year old, I didn't want be an expensive in fear of it being broken by children.  I was expecting it to be just something for the kids to play angry bird on. To my surprise it was really a good tablet, you can download from google play, screen was really responsive, and the micro Sd slot was really a plus.  I would definitely by another in the future

Reviews.Title: Junk!
Reviews.Author: DJ BRAND-X
Reviews.Content: Dont buy it.  I cannot for the life of me figure out how to download anything with this piece of junk!  So disapointed.  I thought it would be a pretty good deal because it was at a good price and it would have made a good xmas gift.  Its been sitting under the coffee table since the day after xmas because its trash!

Reviews.Title: Did not work for me!
Reviews.Author: Jade
Reviews.Content: This would have been a great product for my 8 year old, if I could only get the touch screen to operate to input the Gmail info. Maybe I just got a defected tablet. *shrugs* It has been returned and I ordered something else. Hopefully this will work much better.

Reviews.Title: My daughter is extremely happy
Reviews.Author: AlisonJ75
Reviews.Content: This tablet was purchased by and for my 10 year old daughter with her own birthday money. It was delivered on time, however, the packaging was not secure, as the side of the box was simply folded in; no tape, no seal whatsoever. As for the product itself, it works great, but only after 2 weeks, the headphones no longer work, which is disappointing for her, as she prefers to use them whenever using her tablet. We will be going to buy a new set of headphones for it, but other than that, again, she absolutely loves it. It's perfect for a young child, or as a starter tablet for even an adult.

Reviews.Title: Poor Battery Life
Reviews.Author: waslost2u
Reviews.Content: For the price, not a bad purchase.  A nice cheap way to get familiar with an android tablet.  Easy to connect to Wi-Fi and download apps.Two cons: The battery life between charges is less than three hours even with the screen illumination adjusted to 50%!!  The touch screen is super sensitive, very difficult to scroll without selecting something unwanted.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Zeepad!
Reviews.Author: lynneiggy49
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Zeepad for my grandson and he loves it.  His older brother asked for one for his birthday as well.  It was a hit!

Reviews.Title: very pleased with purchase
Reviews.Author: South Sound Sailor
Reviews.Content: This tablet (the Zeepad 7.0) was a birthday gift for my 10 year old son. He is VERY rough with toys and anything that's electronic. I was hesitant to give him a tablet of any kind but he had shown great interest in using his mom's Kindle Fire (under her watchful eye!), including practicing reading skills, so I decided to go with a budget-priced tablet and get him one of his own. We are now at week 3 with his use of the Zeepad and so far, so good! He uses it daily for Netflix, Angry Birds and reading e-books. I estimate he's put at least 80 hours of use into the tablet and it still functions perfectly.I was VERY pleased with the quality of the video, given the price range. I was expecting Netflix movies to appear blocky and lo-res looking but that's not at all the case. I'm very pleased with the overall performance of this tablet. I've had no problems logging into Google Play and installing new apps. Keep in mind - this tablet is NOT going to set speed records. Yes, there are lag times in contrast to higher priced tablets but we're talking maybe 1 to possibly 5 seconds (Netflix in particular can take several seconds to boot up). But once an app is up and running, we've had no performance problems.One BIG caution. The battery life is very short before recharging is required. He usually just stays plugged in (you can charge and use the device at the same time) to avoid having the tablet shut down during a record-breaking Angry Birds game. I estimate the battery life is 2 to 2.5 hours tops.If you are able to cope with the short battery life, I highly recommend the Zeepad for kids and for anyone who is looking for a low-priced tablet.

Reviews.Title: GREAT!!!
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Starling
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for our 3 year old because she loves to play on our phones. Very easy to use, great product for the price!! I would definitely recommend this!!

Reviews.Title: Amazing!!!
Reviews.Author: Teresa McMillian
Reviews.Content: Love this product, it works well and it's just right for me. Iove the color, I give this product five stars!!

Reviews.Title: Dead on Arrival
Reviews.Author: Laura "Laura A."
Reviews.Content: I was excited to find an affordable tablet, I couldn't wait to use it.  It arrived quickly, and secure packaging etc.The product simply didn't work.  It didn't remotely have a charged battery when it arrived, so I tried to plug it in.  The pin alignment for the power source is very small, and the edging / border sort of hid the pin area. I did have to wiggle it around a little bit for it to make a connection.  I was hopeful when it displayed a green battery - but instantly it turned red, and powered off.I tried to connect with the micro usb to usb cord.  It did turn on momentarily with a logo, then immediately shut down.The bottom edge border of the tablet seemed raised, and when I pressed on it, it clicked into place.  Hoping this helped with the alignment, I tried to attach the power source again.The green battery light appeared only for an instant, when I moved it on to a table to charge.  This made the powersource lose a solid connection and again this red battery light appeared.I'm very disappointed.  I really was looking forward to having a simple to use tablet with just the basics.  Instead, I received a broken piece of equipment.  I will save my $ and buy something brand name.

Reviews.Title: excelent tablet
Reviews.Author: Victor E. Rivas
Reviews.Content: excelent tablet, practical, funtional, fast, all in this litle tablet.  is very important to have a tablet that give us all that we need.  Funcionability for the family (children, adults, etc).

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Tangie Valmon
Reviews.Content: However; my program is always when the tablet doesn't turn off. They have to do better marketing this product. How is the customer service, what website can I get help from, Who Can I send it back

Reviews.Title: Too underpowered - even for a kid's tablet
Reviews.Author: foxhenchman
Reviews.Content: I thought that since this product was the same price as a kid's toy tablet (Leappad or Innotab) that it would be at least as good and likely much better.  Sadly, the tablet is too underpowered to perform.  I really couldn't run anything at all.  The web browser, camera, simple games (I tried Temple Run) and apps (Parental Control) all crashed and froze repeatedly.

Reviews.Title: 7" Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Pamela Dunbar
Reviews.Content: Love the color, awesome item and received in good time. This was a gift for my oldest granddaughter she will be using it as she goes off to college in the fall.

Reviews.Title: very nice for Grandma
Reviews.Author: servozoom
Reviews.Content: a nice tablet for "disposable" use, give it to the kids or seniors without worry,  Cheap and that's the way it should be.  The KISS rule....  a simple basic tablet.  Use free app Wifi Oh Player and stream from your network.

Reviews.Title: Kids love the Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Terry L. Kennedy
Reviews.Content: Wasn't quite sure what to expect since the price is so much lower than others out there.  Delivery was way quicker than they estimated. Came in perfect condition. Kids love it and haven't put it down since it arrived. It does everything it said it would and they love the color. I am planning on ordering another for the kids and one for myself!!!

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7"
Reviews.Author: bobbye
Reviews.Content: It met my standards. Just wish it had Bluetooth and a backside camera. The battery life was a disappointment, after on a few moments of movie watching it had died.

Reviews.Title: Better Then IPad if you just what something small.
Reviews.Author: Jason Pittenger
Reviews.Content: I got this for my wife that is not a techie. She has a I phone a uses it but her Nook was first gen. This works like a good e-reader, Facebook, and Pandora tablet.

Reviews.Title: Its actually not bad.
Reviews.Author: Arnie Posadas
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my grandmas 1 year old nephew and I had the chance to test it out first and install things before letting the baby handle it. It is pretty responsive for its price and it even got most of the common things that are available in most products like camera, wifi, OTG cable. Although this one did not come with bluetooth, probably for the cost. I was planning to use a bluetooth speakers because although this device comes with speakers..... the sound is really low when trying to play a lullaby song.Overall, you get what you paid for and for this one, I think we got more than what we paid for.

Reviews.Title: Barely adequate...
Reviews.Author: Nick L Coombes
Reviews.Content: I knew at $65 that I was pushing it but this tablet is very buggy. I have a permanent pink line to the left of center screen and it has lots of issues...That being said...useful for travel...but that's about it...

Reviews.Title: Not a bad Tab
Reviews.Author: Thomas L. Cole
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet for my 18 year old daughter who likes it very much. It can Skype and works with Google Play so you can get new apps. She uses it as an ereader and for chatting with friends. In all it is a nice tablet, comfortable in your hands, is very thin and has a good picture. The battery life is not as good as high end tablets about 4 hours of use but, is better than expected for the price of the tablet. I did not expect it to be this nice of a tablet and have been very surprised with its performance. She has not used it for watching movies yet but it works well for checking email and weather when you are in a hurry

Reviews.Author: Tyrell
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my wife a week before Christmas, the price was awesome.  I recieved it on Christmas Eve, just in time for Christmas morning.  And my wife loves it.

Reviews.Title: Really good tablet
Reviews.Author: Gina Paola Cepeda
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the product, it is easy to use and I bought it because is going to be a surprise for my mom. Although I cannot find a way yet to use the keyboard I bought with this tablet.Please I really need help finding out how I can set the blue tooth up on the tablet if this this is the only way to make it work.Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Decent product for the price
Reviews.Author: Andrew A Beach
Reviews.Content: I purchased two.  They are fine for what I wanted.  I wanted something that our kids could play games and watch movies when we travel.  It's not an everyday device.  It doesn't sync properly with google.  The headphone jack is sensitive in order to get both sides to work.  It's less than 1/2 of the price of a kindle and 1/4 of the price of an iPad mini.  You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Discret product
Reviews.Author: Luciano Zuniga
Reviews.Content: The tlablet is good. It has not connectio 3G, but is so good for read, and play some games. It is slowly, but It has all what you need for watch videos and some page web.

Reviews.Title: Started off perfect and a 2 weeks later, its crap
Reviews.Author: Aisha
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my twins 8th birthday. Two weeks after palying on it my son's won't come on at all. There is nothing telling me how to trouble shoot and it is one week past the return date so I am stuck with a tablet that doesn't work and my son is unhappy. I will never buy this product again.

Reviews.Title: QUESTION
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: I am big on music I read that a memory card is best but dose it work with Facebook games and if it did how dose it work smoothly????I gave it a 3 just cause I'm being fare with the reviews that I have seeing I DO NOT OWN ONE

Reviews.Title: works good, shiped within time
Reviews.Author: Cory G "cory g"
Reviews.Content: iv had this product for about 2 weeks its worked great, it shipped in a timely manner. i would recommend this product to someone looking for a good low priced tablet. orderd a micro sd and case.

Reviews.Title: THis is a great little pad
Reviews.Author: Carol "Mother of 3 rugrats"
Reviews.Content: Does what i need it to do...much cheaper than Kindle that kids broke LCD screen...at this price i could buy 4 Kindle fires.  Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: I am amazed!
Reviews.Author: N. Bolser
Reviews.Content: It works! and works well.  I have almost no experience with tablets, really have no idea what I'd do with one, but for the price, I figured I'd find out what its good for.  Still working on that part, but this little device is way more than I'd expected.  I nearly sent it back, could not get it to connect up to my wireless at home.  Took it into a local shop and asked nicely if he could get it to connect.  There it was.  Went home, reset the router and the Zeepad immediately connected.  It was me, not the Zeepad.  Off to the Google Play Store...A month later.  I still very much like this little tablet.  Had a terrible time connecting it to the computer by USB, but finally figured out that an option to "debug the USB connection" was checked off.  Sounds like a good thing to do whatever it is, but it stopped the USB connection.  Unchecked it, and bang, it was connected.Haven't found any apps it would not run, mostly games.  Battery life isn't great, but it uses the same micro USB as the cell phones we have, so finding a charger and cable is no problem around the house.  Added a 16 GB memory chip, so the Zeepad is loaded with videos, talking books, epub books, and handles all well.  It did not like the high resolution videos, so ran those through Format Factory to knock down the resolution and shrink the size.  Very watchable.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Isolode
Reviews.Content: My 3 year old daughter loves this tablet I suggest it to anyone whose looking for that electronic babysitter. Only problem is battery life but I can deal with that

Reviews.Title: Get What you pay for
Reviews.Author: Brandon Webb
Reviews.Content: A nice cheap android tablet, only complaint its 2-3hr battery life, but it was my first android tablet Enjoyed it

Reviews.Title: Very poor User Guide
Reviews.Author: Terry Driskell
Reviews.Content: The User Guide was written by someone with very poor English skills.  The guide is of very poor print quality and virtually unreadable and have been unable to find an internet address where I can, hopefully, print up a better quality product.  My grandson may be able to work his way through it.  I'll find out this week from him.  My notebook, computer and tablet have good quality User Guides and negotiating them was much easier.

Reviews.Author: Moraima Materano
Reviews.Content: Was better than expected the product surpriced me with its quality and presentation-Great accesories-So Much qualityI recomend this product to anyone who waits for a excelent product

Reviews.Title: Low battery time
Reviews.Author: pallend
Reviews.Content: the tablet works fine the only problem is how long you can use the tablet on battery only, the answer is about 2 hours

Reviews.Title: Actually Not Sure
Reviews.Author: Jaime
Reviews.Content: I cannot really rate this product as I never actually got it. I was suppose to receive it in 3/19/13. It finally showed up on tracking like a few days after that and never made it here. To boot the company asked if  I changed my mind about it that when I received it to send it back to them, to Hong Kong - I'm guessing at my cost. They did refund my money however.

Reviews.Title: Horrible product
Reviews.Author: E. A. Moran
Reviews.Content: I had problems since  the minute I opened my box. had 1st one for only 2 weeks.. The second would not even work unless plugged in the wall outlet. Cheaply made. Buttons are inconveniently placed. Personally spend a few more bucks for a better brand.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work
Reviews.Author: Kevin Schwarz
Reviews.Content: I followed all instructions, but it was stuck on the Android screen. Tried to put new firmware on it, that didn't work either. Easy return.

Reviews.Title: NOT GOOD!!!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This tablet s very reasonable, but its very cheap!!! I dropped the tablet on carpet and it broke.... I tried to get in contact with the company and they still haven't responded. Zeepad is very unprofessional

Reviews.Title: IAM SO GLAD MY FRIEND TOLD ME ABOUT THIS PRODUCT.
Reviews.Author: chasity
Reviews.Content: IT VERY EASY TO USE MY SON LOVES IT..  IT IS SMALL ENOUGH I CARRY IT IN MY PURSE WHEN HE DONE PLAYING IT .  THE ONLY THING IS I WISH THE BATTERY LIFE LASTED LONGER..

Reviews.Title: Cute little Zeepad gadget!
Reviews.Author: Jannie Annie
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet as a reader for my granddaughter. I decided to test it out before giving it to her. I have to say I am quite impressed with it. It worked great right out of the box. I followed the directions and charged it 2 1/2 hours before using it. It is so cute in pink. The graphics are nice and the speed is good. It has some handy pre-loaded aps such as Facebook, Google and fun games I know she will like such as Angry Birds and Fruit Ninja. It is so much more than a reader. I've only had it a couple of days and it has an ap for the reader but I haven't had time to test that yet. It completes with much more expensive tablets so I have to say so far I'm very happy with this purchase and you certainly get much more than your monies worth!!!!

Reviews.Title: My 9 year old  grandson love it
Reviews.Author: correy bradley
Reviews.Content: No problem easy to operate n downloads it came in excellent condition and I will purchase another one in the near futre

Reviews.Title: Best for games, not for internet surfing
Reviews.Author: Pete Sakes
Reviews.Content: My Android cellphone with budget service (Boost) has an easier time loading webpages than the zeepad running off of wifi.I bought this for my daughter, however, and it is for her to download and play android app games, not surf the web, and it is great for playing games. I have had a few freezes, but only while trying to visit webpages, none yet during game play. I will update if anything goes completely kablooey with it. I'm pleased with what I paid for it, as it works for its intended purpose. Had I bought it for personal use, I would be very, very disappointed. I purchased a GTAB Nero by Matricom for myself and had to return it. It was practically dead on arrival. Now I've purchased a (slightly) more expensive iRULU 9 inch for personal use. I haven't received it yet, so we shall see...

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Stoneman
Reviews.Content: Great product. The package was received on time. it was brand new in great working condition. my daughter hasnt put it down since I gave it to her. I am very pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Biggest piece of junk! Waste of money
Reviews.Author: Nate G Man
Reviews.Content: I received my Zeepad very soon after ordering it but when I opened the box I found the screen already scuffed up.  I figure it was a cheap tablet so I shouldn't expect too much but I couldn't even run applications without it locking up.  Do not buy this tablet!

Reviews.Title: Worth it
Reviews.Author: Steve Barczewski
Reviews.Content: I got this for my son for his birthday and he loves it. Definately worth it even though it is cheap it works great

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: wendy hunsinger
Reviews.Content: The zeepad is just what I was looking for and the price was right. I would recomend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: not bad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: IMPORTANT RUN AVG OR SOME ANTIVIRUS AS SOON AS U GET TABLETThe tablet comes installed with games and 2 of the games came up as potentially threatening so if u just hand it to your kid and they try to play those games u are at risk I use avg pro its still$15 bucks but I have it installed on 4 devices so worth the money u can get it in the play store this tablet is awesome but an adult should go thru all the settings and run spywear b4 handing it over to kids as I said in my updates whoever rooted the device changed the settings if u run avg it will walk u thru the settings at the end of the scan to protect your deviceI bought this tablet for my 18 month old daughter because she is determined to keep up with her older brothers and loves all the learning apps available for young toddlers I must say this tablet is great for her im going to try to find a kid tuff case of course the tablet is on the cheaper side I only paid 76 bucks im not complaining all the apps work and this tab has options to delete installed apps and options to move apps to sd card I did not have those options on my galaxy so not bad at all shes gonna be so excited to play her word games when she wakes up from naptimeUpdateJust realized this tab comes rooted I know this is a high selling point for some it makes me a little nervous but so far so good I will update again if anything else pops upUpdateSo my daughter loves it the abc phonics games are a must for anyone with young toddlers the zeepad is definatly great so far of course the speakers suck and itscheap plastic its only $76 bucks I recommend going thru the settings whoever rooted it set those kind of weird still tweaking them my daughter doesnt want to let go of the thing its great for kids and budgets I cnt afford an ipad and if I could im not handing It to my child so this is a great way for u to let your youngster play without losing out on $500 or more if they drop itUpdateDay 2 with the zeepad the charger works its battery life definatly isnt great and it depletes even when your not using the tablet but I also believe those small annoyances to be the reason the zeepad is available for such a cheap price its a wonderful beginner tablet for young kids it comes already installed with kids games and is obviously intended for kids but as I said before if your on a budget an adult could find this useful also its not the fastest or the best thats why its so cheap but its still more than enough for my daughter to watch her shows and play her apps I would definatly recommend this tablet to others great purchaseUpdateThe tablet is still working despite the fact my 18 month old has been drooling and pushing on the screen a little harder than I like then again I bought her the zeepad so she wouldnt abuse my galaxy anymore so I guess I shouldnt complain reading the reviews are what helped me make my purchase and they are also how I determine what seller to purchase from that is ehy I keep updating I feel like this tablet is a good deal if u purchase from a reliable seller and supervise your kids charge it for them its not a tank they can still break it make them sit on the couch while they play it instead of running with it this tablet is cheap and has tons of features but its not durable or it would cost more if u want durable spend $100 more bucks and u will get higher quality this is a great beginner tablet its still quite fast for a single core processor and has tons of features runs netflix youtube and my comcast apps all fine on comcast I have to log out then back in somtimes for it to work but for it $76 delivered its not that big of a deal plus u can install apps that require root access my tablet doesnt do that and to buy higher end rooted tablets is at least $100 more on top of what the going price is so im assuming the negative reviews are the people who bought from the seller at the very bottom offering the dual camera on the probably fake zeepadsUpdateIts been a couple weeks now the zeepad is still charging and works great I only charge it about once a week but I also shut it off when my daughter isnt playing it I think this was a great deal my daughter loves it and it plays all her movies and games without any problemsUpdateThe zeepad is still working just got done loading a bunch of free mp3 songs for my daughter off of the free app I got off google play I really dnt understand all the bad ratings for my$76 bucks this is an amazing deal we have 3 samsung galaxy tab2 also and this tablet does just as much a little slower at times and not as good quality but for the price this is a great dealUpdateSkype works and all of the other apps we have loaded on here just got done reading elmo and dora ebooks we downloaded on the kindle app I still cnt figure out why people dnt like this tablet I'm writing my review on it rn the battery isn't that bad and why would u want your child playing 5hrs of games a day anyways either way zeepad still works and we still love it

Reviews.Title: ZEEPAD, SELLER DracoTek Please Read
Reviews.Author: Damita J Pannell
Reviews.Content: I had to contact the seller because the shipping address was incorrect. I chatted with Amazon and they sent a request to Draco Tek. I also sent an email to Drack Tek and they responded within 48 hours...I was impress with the seller and Amazon for helping me c

Reviews.Title: Ehhhhh. Its ok.
Reviews.Author: David Johnson
Reviews.Content: The tablet shipped very quickly!! I opened it up and the tablet was brand new. No problems at all except for lag and the screen is crappy otherwise its good for the money.

Reviews.Title: This tablet is awesome!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Lakesha green
Reviews.Content: I give this tablet 5 stars. This tablet is awesome. I brought four tablets as gifts for my kids and they just love it.
